name: FamineFuryTD
description:
--------------------------------------

Controls:

WASD - Move

1 - Select Scarecrow

2 - Select Crossbow

Left Click/Spacebar w/ one of these selected - Place scarecrow/crossbow

Left Click/Spacebar w/o holding any towers - Attack enemies or upgrade towers

-----------------------------------

Upgrade Scarecrows to increase their dmg/attack speed, upgrade crossbows to increase their dmg/range.

Upgrade the Farm to increase your income at the beginning of each Day.

-----------------------------------

Upgrade Costs:

  • Crossbow/Scarecrow lvl 0 - $10
  • Crossbow/Scarecrow lvl 1 - $20
  • Crossbow/Scarecrow lvl 2 - $40
  • Crossbow/Scarecrow lvl 3 - $80
  • Crossbow/Scarecrow lvl 4 - $160
  • Crossbow/Scarecrow lvl 5 - $380
  • Crossbow/Scarecrow lvl 6 - $760
  • Crossbow/Scarecrow lvl 7 - $1520
  • Crossbow/Scarecrow lvl 8 - $3040
  • Crossbow/Scarecrow lvl 9 - $6080
  • Farm lvl 1 - 80
  • Farm lvl 2 - 160
  • Farm lvl 3 - 300
  • Farm lvl 4 - 600
  • Farm lvl 5 - 1000
  • Farm lvl 6 - 1500
  • Farm lvl 7 - 2000
  • Farm lvl 8 - 3000
  • Farm lvl 9 - 4000
